posts.postText: Low Gravity turns off if you go on a ladder. On jail of course

Yeah, one of the most annoying things about ladders i think I will ever find lol.  But yeah, I now avoid ladders at all costs, so a fix would be nice, or even a post like "We are aware" or "It's not fixable" , something.
